## The content value chain

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column}

Content stuck in my computer is nearly worthless.

### Goal

- Move good content out of my computer **as fast as possible**
- Reproducible
- Git-based collaboration
- Write once, generate:
  - Code
  - Paper
  - PowerPoint
  - Site/documentation
:::
